link.title: COVID-19 SPED Support – West Holmes Schools

div.class: fl-row fl-row-fixed-width fl-row-bg-none fl-node-5d6bc89d77527 fl-row-custom-height fl-row-align-top

div.p: We know you are currently challenged in more ways than you had ever imagined. The health and well-being of your family is most important. We all have many questions and unknowns at this time, so this page is to help you with what we do know and the ways we can support you and your child from a distance.
During the closure, your child’s IEP case manager will start contacting you and your child on a weekly basis starting the week of April 6th…
